You start with 1 plant production, 1 M€: Vous commencez avec une production de plantes de 1, un production de M€ de 1, un production de chaleur de 1 et 40 M€.
Effect: At game end, score -2 / 0 / 1 /: Effet : À la fin de la partie, gagnez -2 / 0 / 1 / 2 PV PAR TYPE DE BADGE pour 0 / 1-2 / 3-4 / 5+ badges.
You start with 62 M€. As your first acti: You start with 62 M€. As your first action, place 2 hazard tiles adjacent to no other tiles.
Effect: You do not lose production when: Effect: You do not lose production when placing adjacent to hazard tiles.
You start with 40 M€ and 2 steel product: You start with 40 M€ and 2 steel production.
Effect: When you place a tile on an area: Effect: When you place a tile on an area that has a RESOURCE placement bonus, or on top of another tile, you may pay 2 M€ to draw a card.
You start with 46 M€. As your first acti: You start with 46 M€. As your first action, draw an Ares card.
Action: Place a new hazard tile adjacent: Action: Place a new hazard tile adjacent to NO OTHER TILE, OR remove a hazard tile to gain 1 TR.
You start with 32 M€. As your first acti: Vous commencez avec 32 M€. Comme première action, placez 2 délégués sur un parti.
Effect: You have +1 influence. When you: Effet : Vous avez +1 d'influence. Quand vous envoyez un délégué utiliser l'action Faire du lobby, vous payez 2M€ de moins.
You start with 120 M€. Lower your TR 7 s: Vous commencez avec 120 M€. Réduisez votre NT de7.
You start with 38 M€ and 1 energy produc: Vous commencez avec 38M€ and une production d'Énergie de 1.
Action: Replay a played event from any p: Action: Replay a played event from any player (INCLUDING events that place special tiles) by paying its cost ONLY in M€ (discounts and rebates apply), then REMOVE IT FROM PLAY.
You start with 39 M€, 1 steel and 1 tita: Vous commencez avec 39 M€, 1 acier et 1 titane. Comme première action, piochez une carte bleue.
Action: Flip and discard a played blue c: Action : Retournez et défaussez une carte bleue jouée pour convertir n'importe quel PV dessus en NT et piochez 2 cartes, ou dépensez 3 M€ pour piocher une carte bleue.
You start with 43 M€. As your first acti: You start with 43 M€. As your first action, discard the top 3 cards of the deck.
ACTION: SHUFFLE THE DISCARD PILE, THEN D: ACTION: SHUFFLE THE DISCARD PILE, THEN DRAW 3 CARDS FROM IT. KEEP 1 AND DISCARD THE OTHER 2.
You start with 39 M€. Increase your TR 1: You start with 39 M€. Increase your TR 1 step.
Effect: When any player takes an action: Effect: When any player takes an action or plays a card that increases TR, including this, gain 1 M€ for each step.
